chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Doral Barran, p. 268 [7]—Wisdom of Emond's Field. She is the oldest woman in Emond's Field, possibly in the entire Two Rivers. She is white-haired and frail, though still clear-eyed and not stooped at all. Her last apprentice died of a mysterious illness that she could not cure. She currently has another apprentice, Nynaeve al'Meara, who has been studying under her for three years. See also al'Meara, Nynaeve.
